PostProcessing::PyPointSpriteTransferMesh

PostProcessing::PyPointSpriteTransferMesh Class Reference

This class implements a FilterQuad that renders every pixel on the screen as point sprites. More...

#include <py_point_sprite_transfer_mesh.hpp>

Detailed Description

This class implements a FilterQuad that renders every pixel on the screen as point sprites.
